Description_lang: Unlocks the $?a137005[Bloodmaw, Frostmourne's Legacy, and Unholy War]?a212611[Hand of the Illidari and Illidari Crest]?a137009[Envoy of Goldrin, Nature's Fury, Stonepaw, and Eldertree]?a137014[Eaglewatch, A Sister's Bond, and Eagle's Rebirth]?a137018[Guardian Spire, Pride of the Sunstriders, and Guardian's Focus]?a137022[The Monkey King's Burden, Toll of the Deep Mist, and Al'Akir's Touch]?a137026[Fist of the Fallen Watcher, Light of the Titans, and Greatsword of the Righteous]?a137030[Crest of the Redeemed, Banner of Purity, and Embrace of the Old Gods]?a137034[Cursed Hand, Promise of the Seascourge, and Shadowblade]?a137038[Stormkeeper, Stormbringer, and Scepter of the Deep]?a137042[Hand of the Afflicted, Gaze of the First Summoner, and Hubris of the Dark Titan]?a137047[Vengeance of the Fallen, Arm of the Dragonrider, and Arm of the Fallen King][Heroic] artifact appearances.

description_blz.en_US: Unlocks the Guardian Spire, Pride of the Sunstriders, and Guardian's Focus artifact appearances.
description_blz.es_MX: Desbloquea las apariencias de artefacto Cumbre guardiana, Orgullo de los Caminantes del Sol y Enfoque del guardián.
description_blz.pt_BR: Desbloqueia as aparências de artefato Pináculo do Guardião, Orgulho dos Andassóis e Concentração do Guardião.
description_blz.de_DE: Schaltet die Artefaktvorlagen Spitze des Wächters, Stolz der Sonnenwanderer und Fokus des Wächters frei.
description_blz.en_GB: Unlocks the Guardian Spire, Pride of the Sunstriders, and Guardian's Focus artifact appearances.
description_blz.es_ES: Desbloquea las apariencias de los artefactos ~Aguja Guardiana~, ~Orgullo de los Caminantes del Sol~ y ~Foco del Guardián~.
description_blz.fr_FR: Débloque les apparences d’armes prodigieuses Flèche du gardien, Fierté des Hauts-Soleils et Focalisation du gardien.
description_blz.it_IT: Sblocca i seguenti aspetti dell'Artefatto: Spira Guardiana, Orgoglio dei Solealto e Focus del Guardiano.
description_blz.ru_RU: Разблокирует внешний вид артефактов Посох Хранительницы, Гордость Солнечных Скитальцев и Средоточие Хранителя.
description_blz.ko_KR: 수호자의 첨탑, 태양길잡이의 자부심, 수호자의 집중 유물 형상을 잠금 해제합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 解鎖守護者尖塔、逐日者的驕傲和守護者的專注神器外觀。
description_blz.zh_CN: 解锁守护者塔杖，逐日者之傲和守护者的焦镜神器外观。
